top_reviews.title: Well made! Works well! Get one of every color!!
top_reviews.body: This little charger packs a punch! It has traveled with me all this year for business and been well worth the money! I currently have another ont he way in another color because this one keeps getting taken by my family!! I love that all the cords are there for you! No carrying cords, searching for cords, etc! You can charge multiple items at a time and it does not phase it!! It charges fast and charges your phone even faster! I have gotten more compliments on this charger with others having to borrow it! It‚Äôs fallen out of bags and slide across floors with ease and still keeps on ticking! Definitely worth the buy! Great for stocking stuffers too!! I will probably buy an extra for Dirty Santa this year! Who doesn‚Äôt need a phone charger to go!? Why did you pick this product vs others?: The look and functionality! Battery life: Lasts a long time! Charging ability: Charge multiple things at a time! Portable capacity: All the cords you need are built in!! Read more
